description.0: A weapon you obtained from an Aranara tale. It has taken on the shape of a bow that can shoot the enemies of the forest down.

0.0: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by <cryo>60</cryo> for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal <cryo>100%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

1.0: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by <cryo>80</cryo> for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal <cryo>120%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

2.0: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by <cryo>100</cryo> for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal <cryo>140%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

3.0: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by <cryo>120</cryo> for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal <cryo>160%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.

4.0: Obtain the Teachings of the Forest effect when unleashing Elemental Skills and Bursts, increasing Elemental Mastery by <cryo>140</cryo> for 12s. This effect will be removed when switching characters. When the Teachings of the Forest effect ends or is removed, it will deal <cryo>180%</cryo> of ATK as DMG to 1 nearby opponent. The Teachings of the Forest effect can be triggered once every 20s.
